description: Schema for a bad row resulting from schema violations

messages.description: List of failure messages associated with the tracker protocol violations

anyOf.description: String supplied for schema validation was not JSON

field.description: Field which ended up not being json

value.description: Stringified representation of the value which is not json

anyOf.description: Json supplied for schema validation was not self-describing

error.description: Issue which the json which makes it not self-describing

json.description: Supplied JSON which was not self-describing

anyOf.description: Supplied JSON does not match the associated schema criterion

schemaCriterion.description: The schema criterion which was not respected

anyOf.description: Supplied JSON did not validate against its schema (or schema was not found)
Resolution error - schema could not be found in the specified repositories, defined by ResolutionError in the Iglu Client

attempts.description: Number of attempts which have been made

errors.description: Set of errors which happened for this repository

error.description: Type of error (NotFound does not contain a message)

message.description: Optional message in case of ClientFailure or RepoFailure

lastAttempt.description: Timestamp of a last attempt being made

repostitory.description: Name of the repostitory as written in resolver.json

anyOf.description: Data is invalid against resolved schema

message.description: Human-readable message describing the issue with the schema

path.description: JSON Path to an issue in the faulty JSON datum

anyOf.description: Schema is invalid and cannot be used to validate an instance

schemaIssues.description: List of problems in resolved JSON schema

message.description: Human-readable message describing the issue with the schema

path.description: JSON Path to an issue in the faulty JSON Schema

schemaKey.description: The iglu schema coordinates to validate against

timestamp.description: Timestamp at which the failure occurred

enriched.description: The partially enriched event that resulted in schema violations

raw.description: The raw event extracted from collector payload

contentType.description: Content type of the payload as detected by the collector

headers.description: List of the headers part of this collector payload

hostname.description: Hostname of the payload as detected by the collector

ipAddress.description: IP address of the payload as detected by the collector

refererUri.description: Referer of the payload as detected by the collector

timestamp.description: Timestamp at which the payload was collected

userId.description: Network user id associated with this payload

useragent.description: User agent of the payload as detected by the collector

vendor.description: Vendor of the adapter that processed this payload, here com.snowplowanalytics.snowplow

version.description: Version of the adapter that processed this payload

processor.description: Information about the piece of software responsible for the creation of schema violations

artifact.description: Artifact responsible for the creation of schema violations

version.description: Version of the artifact responsible for the creation of schema violations
